First thing, i don't know why Imdb has gave this movie 5 points out of 10. The movie has good story line, with some good message. The plot of story is amazing. There are lots of twist and turns in the movie. Actors has done good job in their respective role. All together the movie is good too watch. And last i want indian viewers to support such content, stop watching content which are ment for brainwash, bollywood rarely come with such type of good content. Support such content and avoid those same old love stories and fake love dramas.   

Thank you.
